name: Don't Be Still!
description:
Controls!

WASD = Movement

Left Mouse Button = Shoot

Don't be still!


However, it's in very early days of development. This is more of a concept than a fully-fledged game, though I hope to develop it by adding more enemies, perhaps make the UI less hideous, and adding maps.

Music taken from Eric Skiff, who released it under the Creative Commons license.

The source code for this game can be found at https://github.com/HoratioZEDU/horatiozedu.github.... if you're interested. It's not very tidy nor very efficient I'm sure but hey, there it is.
